actions.name: Open Workflow
actions.description: Launch the app to the state when it was last used.

actions.name: Create A New Workflow
actions.description: Jump to My Workflows and create an empty new workflow.

actions.name: Open A Workflow
actions.description: Launch the app to a particular workflow in your collection.

actions.name: Run A Workflow
actions.description: This functionality may be useful in automation systems that extend beyond Workflow itself, so other apps can run a workflow in your collection. Or, you could utilize this URL in a task manager like OmniFocus or Todoist for running a workflow as one step in a project.

parameters.name: input
parameters.description: This value determines what will be provided as input to the beginning of the workflow.

options.description: ”text” - the input given by the parameter ”text” will be used as input.
”clipboard” - the contents of the clipboard will be used as input.

parameters.name: text
parameters.description: When the ”input” parameter is set to ”text” this text is used as input to the workflow.

parameters.name: x-success
parameters.description: When the run was successful the callback will be called with

options.description: result - the textual output of the workflow.

parameters.name: x-error
parameters.description: When there was an error the callback will be called with

options.description: errorMessage - a description of the error.

actions.name: Import A Workflow
actions.description: Workflow also has the ability to accept .wflow files and import them into My Workflows. This is useful, for example, if you would like to share a workflow online and provide a link for others to instantly add it to their library.

parameters.name: url
parameters.description: A URL pointing to the .wflow file you want to import.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: What to name the new workflow. If not provided, the workflow filename is used.

parameters.name: silent
parameters.description: By default, the imported workflow will be opened and displayed to the user. Set this parameter to ”true” to import without opening the workflow.

parameters.name: x-success
parameters.description: When the run was successful the callback will be called with

options.description: result - the textual output of the workflow.

parameters.name: x-error
parameters.description: When there was an error the callback will be called with

options.description: errorMessage - a description of the error.

actions.name: Open Gallery
actions.description: Open workflow on the main page of the gallery.
